text: The police on Thursday arrested a 22-year-old youth on charges of abducting a Class XI student and marrying her. G. Prabakaran of Bodinaickenpatti reportedly took the girl to Tiruchendur recently and married her. On Thursday, they had returned to Namakkal. He dropped her at the bus stand and fled the place. The girl informed her grandfather, who in turn lodged a complaint with the All Women Police Station. The police registered a case under Section 366 (kidnapping woman to compel her marriage) and Section 4 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012. The police arrested Prabakaran and lodged him in prison. The girl was sent to government reception home.
title: Youth arrested
